name: Aeroclub de Colombia
about: Aeroclub De Colombia, founded in 1947, is a premier aeronautical training center approved by the Civil Aeronautics Administration of Colombia. With a rich history of promoting sportsmanship and camaraderie among aviation enthusiasts, the academy offers comprehensive flight training programs for both commercial and private pilots. Our experienced instructors, spacious classrooms, and advanced facilities at Guaymaral Airport ensure high-quality education. We provide training in commercial IFR and VFR fixed-wing aircraft, as well as private pilot and flight instructor programs. Our fleet includes a diverse range of aircraft and state-of-the-art simulators, ensuring a safe and thorough learning environment. Committed to safety and excellence, Aeroclub De Colombia is dedicated to developing the next generation of pilots with the highest standards of training and safety.
services: ["Visual Private Pilot (VFR) license\nPPA - IFR Program\nPPA-VFR Program"]
